proposal: Diving into the world of alter egos, we see John Barron has been making moves since the '80s, just like us, but in the realm of boosting public images. With 38 holders in the ETH network, congrats on keeping the intrigue alive! If John Barron were to dive into the crypto world today, our DEX and Lottery tools could be his next best disguise, allowing anyone in the community to deploy and share in the revenue. Let's blend the art of anonymity with the power of blockchain, shall we?
